content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (x1) and a furnace at position (y1)
- Burner mining drill at position (x2) and a furnace at position (y2)

### Coal Distribution System
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (x3) connected to a chest at position (z1), which is intended to distribute coal to other entities.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors in Coal Distribution Setup
- Ensure that chests or other entities intended to receive resources are correctly aligned and connected to the source of those resources. Adjust setups if resources are not being delivered as expected.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
